#summary How to build this project code?

= Introduction =

This project is developed under [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven].
So you need to setup maven first.

All prebuilt jars for download are available here:
|| [http://search.maven.org/remotecontent?filepath=com/google/code/gwtsecurity/gwtsecurity-requestfactory/1.3.2/gwtsecurity-requestfactory-1.3.2.jar gwtsecurity-core-1.3.2.jar] || Core Library ||
|| [http://search.maven.org/remotecontent?filepath=com/google/code/gwtsecurity/gwtsecurity-core/1.3.2/gwtsecurity-core-1.3.2.jar gwtsecurity-requestfactory-1.3.2.jar] || Request Factory Library ||

= Details =

You can download this code using [http://subversion.tigris.org/ Subversion].  Run the command:
{{{ 
svn co https://gwtsecurity.googlecode.com/svn/tags/gwtsecurity-1.3.2 
}}}

Then, run the command:
{{{ 
cd gwtsecurity-1.3.2
mvn install
}}}
to install library to your local repository. 

You can download the demo application using [http://subversion.tigris.org/ Subversion].  Run the command:
{{{ 
svn co https://gwtsecurity.googlecode.com/svn/tags/gwt4ssdemo-1.3.0
}}}

Then, run the command:
{{{
cd gwt4ssdemo-1.3.0
mvn package
}}}
